*** Problem 1 ***

```{r}
pols_month_df = 
    read_csv("./fivethirtyeight_datasets/pols-month.csv", na = c("NA", ".")) |>
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  separate(mon, into = c("year", "month", "day"), sep = "-", convert = TRUE) |> 
  mutate(month = month.name[month]) |> 
  mutate(
    president = case_when(
      prez_dem == 1 ~ "dem",
      prez_gop == 1 ~ "gop")
) |> 
  select(-prez_dem, -prez_gop, -day)
  
pols_month_df
```
